name: describe.each
description: Data driven variant of `describe` to reduce duplication when testing the same code with different data.
The returned function matches regular `describe`, except the callback you pass to it will be run for each test case you define.
The callback you pass to the returned function will be called for each test case, and the value of that test case will be unpacked and passed to your callback.
This is essentially the same as calling `describe` in a for loop.
